strings:
<voice_0x01001818><se_low>Chen Mui: So you have decided to take the
Dragovian Trials.
<voice_0x01001819><se_low>Chen Mui: I hope you'll allow me to accompany you as Munchie again.
<voice_0x0100181A><se_low>Chen Mui: Actually, it isn't a request. We've come together this far. I have every intention of us staying together until the end!
<voice_0x0100181B><se_low>Chen Mui: Let us go, then. To the Heavenly Dais where the Lord of the Dragovians awaits!
<voice_0x0100181C><se_low>Chen Mui: I have a secret to confess. This grave contains not only the worldly remains of Eltrio, but of Xia as well.

<voice_0x0100181D><se_low>Chen Mui: It seemed only right to bury them together,
after all they had suffered...
<voice_0x0100181E><se_low>Chen Mui: I erected an empty grave for her in the labyrinth to hide the truth from my people.
